parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma3

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.16

</value></part><part><name>serverExec</name>=<value> server

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Curator

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Adds or changes curator edit area (depends on if ID is already used).

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> curatorObj '''addCuratorEditingArea''' [editAreaID,position,radius]
</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> [editAreaID,position,radius]: [[Array]]
</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> curatorObj: [[Object]] - Curator module.

</value></part><part><name>p3</name>=<value> editAreaID: [[Number]]

</value></part><part><name>p4</name>=<value> position: [[Position]]

</value></part><part><name>p5</name>=<value> radius: [[Number]]

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Nothing]]

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>myCurator [[addCuratorEditingArea]] [4, [[position]] [[player]], 1000];</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[Arma 3: Curator]], [[removeCuratorEditingArea]], [[removeAllCuratorEditingAreas]], [[curatorEditingArea]]
</value></part></template></root>
